description.plain: Chappell Roan (born Kayleigh Rose Amstutz in Willard, Missouri) is an American singer and songwriter signed to Atlantic Records. When she was 17 years old and in eleventh grade, Roan uploaded a song titled “Die Young” to YouTube, leading Atlantic to sign her to the label. In summer 2020, she released “Pink Pony Club”, which was later described as “the Song of Summer 2021” in Vulture.
